rg.bio: I’m an Associate Professor in Work and Organizational Psychology at the University of Oslo (UiO).Before joining UiO, I worked as an Assistant Professor at Goethe University Frankfurt, where I also earned my Ph.D. in Psychology. My research  interests include the social identity approach, the work-family interface, and burnout. In particular, I am interested in the positive side of managing work and nonwork roles and in possibilities to increase such positive effects.
